column13: Hype Formal Shoes Price: Rs.942

column1: Upgrade your 9 to 5 attire wearing these charming Formal Shoes from Hype with a pair of Beige formal pants and a white formal shirt. Crafted with an elastic panel and a stitch detail
column2: these shoes bear a 1.5 inch heel and a padded footbed.

column1: Creating sensible footwear for women and making their presence known all across India
column2:
Hype holds true to its name with its wide array of comfortable and trendy shoes that are provided at reasonable prices.
